original_story: "In the heart of the sizzling Sahara, intrepid explorer, Amelia, unearthed a golden amulet buried in the sun-drenched sand. Guided by the amulet’s mystical powers, she traversed treacherous dunes, facing venomous creatures and sandstorms. Finally, she reached an ancient, hidden pyramid, where she unlocked a forgotten civilization’s secrets, forever changing history."

time_frames.title: Amelia unlocks the secrets of the hidden pyramid
